Notes: Unique identifier - maps to Worker ID
Mapped via CO_CODE table (code set 357) to language description
Mapped via CO_CODE table (code set 24) to title description (Mr/Ms/Mrs/Miss)
Mapped via CO_CODE table (code set 11) to gender description (Male/Female)
Street address from POSTAL_ADDRESS_ID (combined STREET + STREET2)
Street address from ADDRESS_ID (combined STREET + STREET2)
Links Contact to Account (employer) - Conditional: Only set if changed to prevent duplicate ACR errors
